summary: DEALER REPLACED HEATER CORE DUE TO LEAK AND FOUND SLUDGE IN COOLING SYSTEM (DEX COOL).  HEATER CORE REPLACED AND SYSTEM FLUSHED 4 TIMES.  HEATER CORE REPLACED AGAIN ON 1/19/03, WATER PUMP REPLACED IN 2/03.  RADIATOR HAS LARGE LEAK 5/22/03.  SLUDGE VISIBLE IN RADIATOR AND OVERFLOW BOTTLE.  DEALER/GM INDICATES PROBLEM WITH SLUDGE BUILD UP CAUSED BY OWNER NOT MAINTAINING SYSTEM.  HEAD GASKET REPLACED IN 2001 AND WINDSHIELD WIPER CIRCUIT BOARD IN 2001 (BAD SOLDER JOINT) - GM INDICATED THE WINDSHIELD WIPER PROBLEM NOT ASSOCIATED WITH VIN NUMBER.  ALL COSTS OUT OF POCKET.   *NLM
